summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 14, Renton's Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue and 17th Avenue, from East Spring Street to East Union Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10885 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
